remarks: The product of two diagonal matrices.  (Contributed by AV, 19-Aug-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 18-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dmatid.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
dmatid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
dmatid.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
dmatid.d $e |- D = ( N DMat R ) $.
dmatmul $p |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( X e. D /\ Y e. D ) ) -> ( X ( .r ` A ) Y ) = ( x e. N , y e. N |-> if ( x = y , ( ( x X y ) ( .r ` R ) ( x Y y ) ) , .0. ) ) ) $.
$d D x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d Y x y $.
